did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Writings, printed matter, sound recordings, and photographs, relating to student democratization movements in Hunan Province, China.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Liang Heng collection, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

chronitem.event: Born in Changsha, Hunan Province, China
Admitted to the Chinese Department at Hunan Teachers College

eventgrp.event: Participated in the 1980 election of the county people's congress

chronitem.event: Co-authored Son of the Revolution, an autobiographical account of the Chinese Cultural Revolution
Co-authored Cold Winds Warm Winds Intellectual Life in China Today and After the Nightmare: A Survivor of the Cultural Revolution Reports on China

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Writings, printed matter, sound recordings, and photographs, relating to student democratization movements in Hunan Province, China.

controlaccess.head: Indexing Terms
controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
controlaccess.subject: Student movements--China.
China--Politics and government--1976-2002.

unittitle.title: "Inside Story of Qin Cheng Prison, undated

did.unittitle: Onsite sound recordings of the student movement, six cassette tapes
Tape One: Sound recording of election town hall meeting, Liang Heng
Tape Two: Sound recording of election town hall meeting, Liang Heng
Tape Three: Sound recording of election town hall meeting, Tao Sen
Tape Four: Sound recording of election rally speeches, Chen An-yong
Tape Five: Sound recordings of hunger strike protest at front of the Provincial Party Committee office
Tape Six: Sound recording of election debate, Professor Cheng Wen-shan
Students' hunger strike movement in Changsha, Hunan Province, 18 color slides and 3 b/w photos, 1980
